meta.title: From CLUE to LESS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Welcome to **RUDDLE**! For the next few days, we'll be rebranding as the only Paul Rudd-themed daily word game. We're starting with Paul's breakout role in Amy Heckerling's Clueless, where he plays the charming Josh, a goateed Nietzsche-reading college boy who patiently negs Alicia Silverstone’s Cher until she realizes she is in love with him, thereby teaching Gen X some really weird things about relationships.
